summary: Wes is slumming it in Bangkok 6 months after killing his best friend in a match in Vegas. He's tricked into Myanmar's jungle, where he's the fox in rich people's hunt.
cast: Scott Adkins|Robert Knepper|Rhona Mitra|Temuera Morrison|Ann Truong|Adam Saunders|Jamie Timony|Peter Hardy|Sean Keenan|Troy Honeysett|Katrina Grey|Gigi Velicitat|Amarin Cholvibul|Thira Chutikul|Geoffrey Giuliano|David Asavanond|Byron Gibson|Eric Cullet|Komkrib 'Krib' Wongwirot|Suthipongse Phukaokaew|Sahajak Boonthanakit|Chanthathanisa Vismitananda|Chiv Patrick Tang|Supoj Khaowwong|Eoin O'Brien|Khiri Lowenstein|Dana Blouin|Lee Livingston|Gin Mung|Maythavee Burapasing

title: Blanco humano 2
